title: Client Glitch
body: My client will open to the point where i can click launch but if i click launch the next client doesn't pop up, instead it closes and idk what to do. Somebody please respond with help

replies.body: As i went into further depths of the forums, i found one comment that told me to make a new account on my windows computer and comepletly reinstall league and i did that, now it works fine. Thank you all for trying to help, spread the word to other troubled summoners such as myself. :)

This specific behavior generally happens when the client is not able to establish a solid connection to the servers. This is often influenced by an unstable connection and our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a good place to start in resolving this.

Let me know if this helped.

1. See if you already have a riot games application opened by clicking the arrow pointing upwards on the bottom right for Windows 10, if so, delete or cancel it (whichever option it says when you right click it) than re-open league of legends as an Administrator.

2. Try contacting Riot using the Support Ticket.
Update, re-downloading league of legends didn't work.
It doesn't say that it is running, i'm going to try to re-download league of legends ill respond if that doesn't work.
